channel.title: Ubuntu Korea Community Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Ubuntu Korea Community Blog

item.title: Contributing to this blog
item.description: If you are organizer or person who participates Ubuntu Korea Community, You can contribute your own posting to this blog. For organizers First, You must be a member of ubuntu-kr organization on GitHub. You will also need read and write acccess to ubuntu-kr/blog.ubuntu-kr.org repository. If you don’t have yet, Ask may other organizers for that. After gaining all access you need, Clone ubuntu-kr/blog.ubuntu-kr.org repository to your machine, And get started with writting post with steps that can be found on this README.
